definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The mechanism of high temperature creep associated with the climb of extended dislocations is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了扩展位错攀移的高温蠕变机制。

sentences.english: The experimental results of the creeping effect for aluminium field wire are reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道了对铝场丝蠕变效应研究的结果。

sentences.english: Simulated galvanic cell tests and stress corrosion tests using pre-creeping specimens were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 进行了模拟原电池试验和预蠕变试样的应力腐蚀试验。

sentences.english: The anisotropy of compression creep strength in a nickel-base single crystal superalloy was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了镍基单晶高温合金压缩蠕变强度的各向异性。

sentences.english: It resists tearing, flex-cut growth, creep and abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 它抗撕，柔性切割增长，蠕变和磨损。

sentences.english: When the alloy contains no or excess magnesium, its creep properties will decline.
sentences.chinese: 不含镁或镁含量过高的合金，其蠕变性能均有所下降。

sentences.english: The Paper discusses the test system for material creep with advanced VXI instrument BUS.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了具有先进VXI仪器总线的材料蠕变测试系统。

sentences.english: Thus, this paper find the thinking of researching creep shope deformation on prediction.
sentences.chinese: 从而总结出了研究蠕变边坡变形预测的一种新思路。

sentences.english: The creep deformation is controlled by dislocation climb resulting from lattice self-diffusion.
sentences.chinese: 该合金的蠕变由晶格自扩散引起的位错攀移所控制。

sentences.english: The laws and facts of cryogen creep of metal materials have been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了金属材料的低温蠕变现象和规律。

sentences.english: Then, the effects of schistosity planes on creep laws of mica-quartz schist are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析片理面对二云石英片岩蠕变的影响。

sentences.english: The creep mechanisms of both composites are dislocation-climbing mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 两种复合材料的蠕变机制均为位错攀移机制。

sentences.english: The creep strain of nonwoven geotextiles is measured by using the method of photic leverage.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用光杠杆法对非织造土工布蠕变量进行测试。

sentences.english: The creep property of nonwoven geotextiles is described well with the model.
sentences.chinese: 该模型可较好地描述非织造土工织物的蠕变性能。

sentences.english: PMMA has a room temperature creep.
